msbt.message: Well, I'll be Even after time was up, you still found that treasure! That's downright heroic, !Sorry kiddo, I gotta take that back.
Thanks for retrievin' that for me. Next time, you should try to do it before you run out of game time.
You alright, kiddo? I was waitin' for you to come back with that treasure I buried, but you never did!Well, it's good to see everything's on the up-and-up. Let's be sure to have us a rematch later, .
